langgexyz/*.description: package.json 中只能使用稳定版本范围，如 ^1.0.0，禁止直接写预发布版本如 ^1.0.0-alpha.4

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.publishalpha: NEXT_VERSION=$(node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const ver=pkg.version; const match=ver.match(/^(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)-alpha\.(\d+)$/); if(match) { console.log(match[1] + '-alpha.' + (parseInt(match[2])+1)); } else { console.log(ver.replace(/^(\d+\.\d+\.\d+).*$/, '$1-alpha.1')); }") && npm version $NEXT_VERSION && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release $NEXT_VERSION" && git tag v$NEXT_VERSION && git push origin master && git push origin v$NEXT_VERSION
